question: One of the developers on your team deployed their application in Google Container Engine with the Dockerfile below. They report that their application deployments are taking too long. [Imagen]: /assets/media/exam-media/04339/0008300001.png You want to optimize this Dockerfile for faster deployment times without adversely affecting the app's functionality. Which two actions should you take? (Choose two.)

options.text: Use a slimmed-down base image like Alpine Linux
Use larger machine types for your Google Container Engine node pools
Copy the source after he package dependencies (Python and pip) are installed
